7-8.name: Ancient
7-8.info: When you deal Melee Damage, roll a d20. On a 20, recover one daily use of your Action Skill.

9-10.name: Amp'd
9-10.info: When you deal Melee Damage, your Gun Attacks get +2d4 Damage until the end of your next turn.

11-12.name: Archmage's
11-12.info: When you deal Melee Damage, roll a d20, on 20, gain a grenade.

13-14.name: Caustic
13-14.info: When you deal Melee Damage, gain +2d4 Elemental Damage until the start of your next Turn.

15-16.name: Echoing
15-16.info: Your Melee Attacks gain +1d4 Damage for each Gun Attack you made on the previous Turn.

17-18.name: Vampiric
17-18.info: When you deal Melee Damage, gain 1d4 Health, or 1d4 Shield Capacity, whichever is lower.

19-20.name: Warrior's
19-20.info: When you deal Melee Damage, gain +1d4 Damage Reduction and +1d4 Melee Damage until the start of your next turn.
